entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support `ExperimentalAttribute.Message` #75221
  • Exception in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UseCollectionInitializer.CSharpUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer #75214

Closed

  • .NET 9 regression: Collection initializer with call to Span property results in System.InvalidOperationException: Unexpected value 'PropertyAccess' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BoundKind' #75222
  • duplicate language feature status #75144
  • Pattern matching an enum using an enum value following by using "with expression" on a record causes a compilation error #75074
    17.12
  • Microsoft.Cci.PdbWriter.GetAssemblyReferenceAlias throws Null Reference exception #74872
    17.12
  • Potential source breaking changes due to params collection #73857
    17.12
  • The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties #75218

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into features/field-keyword #75227
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Move Quick Info content production to the Features layer and add Razor EA co-hosting APIs for Hover and Completion #75226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add option for LSP-based auto insert #75224
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Mark ISourceGenerator as obsolete for implementation #75223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75220
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Field-backed properties: interface properties #75219
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow <code> in DocComments to render as a block in Hover response #75215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collapse the rename UI when commit starts #75213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • docs: fix C# 13 proposal link #75207
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75156
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix parser regressions of conditional expressions #75075
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix null dereference in GetAssemblyReferenceAlias #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #74848
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP logging #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
